You suffered a huge energy impact

buff.description_key: You recently ate some fruit. That's great for your teeth!
You feel perfectly rested and ready for action!
You feel sleepy. You should consider some rest.
You're fatigued. Really dude, get some rest!
You're suffering for severe sleep deprivation! REST!

Dude... Man... Dude..
Dude... I feel goooood...
This feels nice
Finally a bed!
Too bad i don't have company...
Your reflexes are incredibly enhanced.
You release a cloud of the mysterious Wall Crusher gas, and feel suprisingly healthy.
You release an extream electrical discharge, capable of restarting the heart of the fallen.
You release a burst of refreshing cold air
You create a protective field, granting imunity to energy attacks
